text: "Friends and Lovers" is a 1986 song by Gloria Loring featuring Carl Anderson. The recording was not released until Eddie Rabbitt and Juice Newton released it as a country single. It went to number 2 in the United States, number 43 in New Zealand, number 13 in Australia and number 1 in Canada. ==References== Category:1986 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Country ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Country pop songs Category:Eddie Rabbitt songs Category:Juice Newton songs
title: Friends and Lovers (Gloria Loring and Carl Anderson song)
